name: Unnamed Project

entity_types.name: TechCompany
entity_types.description: Technology corporations that design, manufacture, and market consumer electronics and AI devices.

attributes.name: legal_org_name
attributes.description: The full legal name of the technology corporation

attributes.name: hq_location
attributes.description: The city and country where the headquarters are located

entity_types.name: TechReviewer
entity_types.description: Individuals or media channels that test and provide public feedback on new technology products.

attributes.name: social_handle
attributes.description: The primary social media username or handle

attributes.name: review_platform
attributes.description: The main platform where reviews are published (e.g., YouTube, X)

entity_types.name: MarketAnalyst
entity_types.description: Experts or firms that study market trends and predict future industry shifts.

attributes.name: firm_affiliation
attributes.description: The financial or research firm the analyst works for

attributes.name: analysis_specialty
attributes.description: The specific market sector of expertise

entity_types.name: TechJournalist
entity_types.description: Professional writers who report on technology news and corporate developments for media outlets.

attributes.name: media_outlet_name
attributes.description: The news organization the journalist represents

attributes.name: press_credentials
attributes.description: Official accreditation or professional title

entity_types.name: Executive
entity_types.description: High-level corporate leaders who represent their companies in public and social media.

attributes.name: corporate_title
attributes.description: The specific C-suite or leadership title

attributes.name: employer_name
attributes.description: The company the executive leads

entity_types.name: Consumer
entity_types.description: General users and tech enthusiasts who discuss, purchase, and react to new product releases.

attributes.name: user_alias
attributes.description: The display name used on social media platforms

attributes.name: primary_interests
attributes.description: Key tech interests such as mobile, AI, or gaming

entity_types.name: RegulatoryBody
entity_types.description: Government agencies that oversee technology standards, competition, and consumer safety.

attributes.name: jurisdiction_area
attributes.description: The geographic region or legal area of authority

attributes.name: authority_level
attributes.description: The scope of the agency's power (e.g., Federal, International)

entity_types.name: SoftwareDeveloper
entity_types.description: Individuals or teams that create applications and AI software for new hardware platforms.

attributes.name: programming_focus
attributes.description: The primary ecosystem or language focus

attributes.name: portfolio_url
attributes.description: Link to public code repositories or app store pages

entity_types.name: Person
entity_types.description: A fallback type for any individual not fitting specific professional categories.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The legal or common name of the individual

attributes.name: personal_bio
attributes.description: A brief description of the person's background

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: A fallback type for any group, association, or entity not fitting specific categories.

attributes.name: org_full_name
attributes.description: The official name of the organization

attributes.name: industry_sector
attributes.description: The general field the organization operates in

edge_types.name: COMPETES_WITH
edge_types.description: Direct market competition between two technology companies.

edge_types.name: REVIEWS_PRODUCTS_OF
edge_types.description: A reviewer evaluating the hardware or software of a company.

edge_types.name: ANALYZES_MARKET_OF
edge_types.description: An analyst providing predictions or data on a company's performance.

edge_types.name: REPORTS_ON
edge_types.description: A journalist or media outlet covering news about an entity.

edge_types.name: WORKS_FOR
edge_types.description: An individual employed by a specific company or organization.

edge_types.name: RESPONDS_TO
edge_types.description: A social media or public reaction to another entity's actions or posts.

edge_types.name: REGULATES
edge_types.description: Legal or administrative oversight of a company by an agency.

edge_types.name: DISCUSSES_TECH_OF
edge_types.description: General social media conversation regarding an entity's technology.

analysis_summary: The ontology is designed to simulate the social media discourse surrounding the competitive tech landscape of 2025. It captures the interaction
